TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract Adjustments implements class Microsoft.Office.Core._IMsoDispObj

summary.span: 包含指定自选图形、艺术字对象或连接符的调整值的集合。

span.span: Contains a collection of adjustment values for the specified AutoShape, WordArt object, or connector.

remarks.span:
每个调整值表示一种方法可调整的调整控点。由于某些调整控点可以调整以下两种方式 — 例如，某些控点可以水平和垂直调整 — 形状可以有多个调整值比调整控点。形状可以有最多八个调整值。使用
属性返回Adjustments对象。使用调整()，其中是调整值的索引号，返回一个调整值。
不同形状具有不同数量的调整值的不同种类的调整以不同的方式更改形状的几何图形和不同种类的调整有不同的有效值范围。
下表总结了不同类型的调整控点的调整值的有效范围。在大多数情况下，如果您指定为有效的值的范围之外的值最接近的有效值将分配给调整值。
线性 （水平或垂直）通常值 0.0 代表形状的左边缘或上边缘，而值 1.0 代表形状的右或底部边缘。有效的值对应于有效可以对形状进行手动的调整。例如，如果手动跨形状仅可以提取一半的调整控点，相应的调整的最大值将为 0.5。形状如连接器和标注，其中值 0.0 和 1.0 代表定义的起点和终点连接器或标注线的矩形的限制，负号和编号大于 1.0 是有效值。
径向1.0 调整值对应于形状的宽度。最大值是 0.5，或半形状跨。用度表示
角度值。如果您指定的值范围为 180-180，它将回呼要在该范围内。

span.para: Each adjustment value represents one way an adjustment handle can be adjusted. Because some adjustment handles can be adjusted in two ways — for instance, some handles can be adjusted both horizontally and vertically — a shape can have more adjustment values than it has adjustment handles. A shape can have up to eight adjustments.
Use the property to return an Adjustments object. Use Adjustments(), where is the adjustment value’s index number, to return a single adjustment value.

Different shapes have different numbers of adjustment values, different kinds of adjustments change the geometry of a shape in different ways, and different kinds of adjustments have different ranges of valid values.

The following table summarizes the ranges of valid adjustment values for different types of adjustments. In most cases, if you specify a value that’s beyond the range of valid values, the closest valid value will be assigned to the adjustment.

item.description: Generally the value 0.0 represents the left or top edge of the shape, and the value 1.0 represents the right or bottom edge of the shape. Valid values correspond to valid adjustments you can make to the shape manually. For example, if you can only pull an adjustment handle half way across the shape manually, the maximum value for the corresponding adjustment will be 0.5. For shapes such as connectors and callouts, where the values 0.0 and 1.0 represent the limits of the rectangle defined by the starting and ending points of the connector or callout line, negative numbers and numbers greater than 1.0 are valid values.
An adjustment value of 1.0 corresponds to the width of the shape. The maximum value is 0.5, or half way across the shape.
Values are expressed in degrees. If you specify a value outside the range –180 to 180, it will be normalized to be within that range.

span.span: Returns an object that represents the Microsoft Excel application.

summary.span: 返回集合中对象的数目。

span.span: Returns the number of objects in the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public int Creator { get; }
.property instance int32 Creator
Public ReadOnly Property Creator As Integer
public: property int Creator { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个 32 位整数，该整数指示在其中创建了此对象的应用程序。

span.span: Returns a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which this object was created.

span.para: 如果对象在 Microsoft Excel 中创建的此属性返回的字符串 XCEL，这相当于十六进制数字 5843454 c。
Creator属性用于在 Microsoft Excel 中用于的 Macintosh，其中每个应用程序具有四个字符的创建者代码。例如，Microsoft Excel 的创建者代码 XCEL。
If the object was created in Microsoft Excel, this property returns the string XCEL, which is equivalent to the hexadecimal number 5843454C.
The Creator property is designed to be used in Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code. For example, Microsoft Excel has the creator code XCEL.

MemberSignature.Value: public float this[int Index] { get; set; }
.property instance float32 Item(int32)
Default Public Property Item(Index As Integer) As Single
public: property float default[int] { float get(int Index); void set(int Index, float value); };

span.span: The index number of the adjustment.

summary.span: 返回或设置指定的调整值。

span.span: Returns or sets the specified adjustment value.

span.para: 的线性调整，调整值 0.0 通常对应于形状的左边缘或上边缘与值 1.0 通常对应于形状的右或底部边缘。但是，调整可超过形状边界一些形状。对于径向调整，1.0 调整值对应于形状的宽度。对于角度调整，以度表示指定的调整值。Item属性仅适用于有调整的形状。
自选图形、 连接符和艺术字对象可有最多八个调整值。

For linear adjustments, an adjustment value of 0.0 generally corresponds to the left or top edge of the shape, and a value of 1.0 generally corresponds to the right or bottom edge of the shape. However, adjustments can pass beyond shape boundaries for some shapes. For radial adjustments, an adjustment value of 1.0 corresponds to the width of the shape. For angular adjustments, the adjustment value is specified in degrees. The Item property applies only to shapes that have adjustments.
AutoShapes, connectors, and WordArt objects can have up to eight adjustments.
